dct_title_s: North Britain or Scotland divided into its counties
dct_description_sm: by Thomas Kitchin, ... ; Geological map by L.A. Necker.
"Presented to the Geological Society by Mr A L Necker Novr 4th 1808."
"Facsimile of Ms. Geological map, by L.A. Necker, 1808. Reproduced by kind permission of the Geological Society of London."
"Scotland colored according to the rock formation."
